Articles.Content:
Land on the sun

Spoiler

go at night

Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

Thanks for posting; however, the "Challenges" subforum is for actual, "serious" challenges, i.e. real, achievable things to do in KSP.  Jokes can be funny, but this sub-forum isn't really the place for them.

If you'd like a place to post silly jokes (perhaps as a game where other forum users are invited to contribute their own, e.g. "post an impossible mission"), perhaps consider the "Forum Games" subforum?

Anyway, locking this thread since this isn't really the place for this sort of thing.
